translation.en: [man over radio] Incident Command, this is Redding Five approaching a timber fire off Route 16.
translation.it: Soccorsi, qui Redding 5. Abbiamo un incendio boschivo sulla Route 16.

translation.en: We've got a high rate of spread on this one,
translation.it: Le fiamme si sono già propagate

translation.en: with a line of cars that are blocking emergency vehicles,
translation.it: e una fila di macchine blocca i veicoli d'emergenza.

translation.en: so we're gonna send in the jumpers on the left flank.
Approaching drop zone now.
translation.it: Siamo quasi alla zona di lancio.

translation.en: [man 1] Honey, it's really bad. I don't know when…
translation.it: Tesoro, la situazione è grave. Non so quando...

translation.en: We're trapped. We can't get out.
translation.it: Siamo in trappola. Non si esce.

translation.en: -What do we do now? -We need a miracle.
translation.it: E ora che facciamo? Serve un miracolo.

translation.en: -[woman 1] Where? Oh! -[woman 2] Look!
-Where's my Redding Crew at? -[crew members] Everywhere!
translation.it: Dov'è la mia Squadra di Redding? Ovunque!

translation.en: Road's backed up for miles and we need to get emergency teams in here.
translation.it: La strada è intasata per chilometri e devono arrivare le squadre d'emergenza.

translation.en: But right now our job is to keep that fire from those vehicles.
translation.it: Il nostro compito è tenere lontane le fiamme dalle auto.

translation.en: Alpha Team, cut a line upslope and prep for a burn.

translation.en: [crew members] Yes, sir!
Beta Team, stay close to me.

translation.en: [Mark] Love being close to you, Supe.
In the words of Stormin' Norman Schwarzkopf,
translation.it: Come disse il generale Norman Schwarzkopf:

translation.en: "If you can't take the heat, get out the kitchen!"
translation.it: "Se odi il caldo, stai lontano dalla cucina!"

translation.en: Not even close.
Let's disagree to agree, 'cause quotes are my thing.
translation.it: Se lo dici tu, ma io sono il re delle citazioni.

translation.en: Fire's gonna do a 180 off the line!

translation.en: Supe! Laser!
[crew member 2] Alpha Team! Move! Move!
It's getting real warm down here. Got me?

translation.en: -[man over radio] Roger that. -Two… one…
Paint it pink!
Whoo! I love the smell… [laughing] …of Phos-Chek in the morning!
translation.it: Amo l'odore del Phos-Chek di prima mattina!

translation.en: -Whoa! [gags, coughs] -Huh? Whoa, whoa, you okay?
translation.it: Caspita! Stai bene? Oh, no. Tutto ok?

translation.en: I'm good. I'm good.
-Thank you for sav-- [grunts] -[car alarm blaring]
You are the bravest man I've ever seen.
translation.it: Lei è l'uomo più coraggioso che abbia mai conosciuto.

translation.en: -And the hottest. -Thank you, ma'am. But for us,
translation.it: - E il più sexy. - Grazie, signora. Ma per noi,

translation.en: -it's just another day at the office. -[helicopter whirring]
translation.it: è un giorno come un altro.

translation.en: My husband sells insurance! Take me with you!
translation.it: Mio marito vende assicurazioni! Mi porti con lei!

translation.en: I'm literally standing right here.
-[music continues] -[all chattering, cheering]
Hey, hey, hey, guys!
My dawgs, come on, come on.
You crushed it out there, men. You crushed it!
translation.it: Siete stati grandi là fuori. Grandi!

translation.en: Hey, I am so sorry, Supe.
The guys were just blowing off steam. I apologize.

translation.en: There will be time for steam reallocation later.
translation.it: Avrete tempo per scaricarvi più tardi.

translation.en: Our main priority is to get this depot tip-top.
translation.it: Ora dobbiamo pulire la caserma da cima a fondo.

translation.en: Gentlemen, you know how quickly things can go sideways.

translation.en: Heck, my dad was the greatest smokejumper ever to hang boots in this depot.
translation.it: Mio padre è stato il più grande pompiere paracadutista di questa caserma.

translation.en: [man] Mm, I don't know.
[Mark] Now I got it. It's a bit sliver!
translation.it: Ora è a posto. Una scheggia!

translation.en: [exhales sharply, groaning] That is-- that is in there.
translation.it: Mi si è infilata nella mano.

translation.en: Gentlemen, we must be at our very best…
-Every second of every day! -Every second of every day!
translation.it: - ogni istante di ogni giorno! - Ogni istante di ogni giorno!

translation.en: Exactly. Now, where's my Redding Crew at?
translation.it: Esatto. Dov'è la mia Squadra di Redding?

translation.en: -Everywhere! -Everywhere!
-[reporter] Commander Richards. -[Commander Richards] Mm.
translation.it: BASE POMPIERI PARACADUTISTI REDDING, CA Comandante Richards.

translation.en: The way you and your men put out that fire today,
it felt like it was really the work of superheroes.
translation.it: come dei veri supereroi. LIVE CHANNEL 10 - ULTIME NOTIZIE

translation.en: "Superheroes"?
That's the Santa Barbara fire!
[Commander Richards] No. We're just men with a lot a training,
very strict exercise regimens, and first-class genetics.
translation.it: e ben allenati con un DNA di prima categoria. INCENDI DI SANTA BARBARA CONTENUTI INVIATA SHANA HIATT

translation.en: Now that I say it out loud, I guess we are superheroes.
translation.it: Ora che lo dico ad alta voce, forse siamo davvero dei supereroi.

translation.en: [reporter] After a storied career as Division Commander,
translation.it: Dopo una lunga carriera come capo distretto,

translation.en: rumor has it you're considering retirement.
translation.it: pare stia considerando di andare in pensione.

translation.en: -Care to comment? -The rumors are true.
You should be the next Division Commander. You've been training for this
translation.it: Dovresti essere tu il suo successore. Ti prepari a questo

translation.en: since you were saving LEGO people from LEGO fires.
translation.it: da quando salvavi gli omini LEGO dagli incendi LEGO.

translation.en: It's what my dad and I always dreamed of.
translation.it: È ciò che io e mio padre sognavamo.

translation.en: [Commander Richards] …the ability to put a fire out.
[reporter] Commander Richards, are you afraid of anything?
translation.it: Comandante, ha mai paura di qualcosa?

translation.en: -Uh, Supe? -No, I'm not afraid of anything.
translation.it: - Capo? - Non ho paura di niente.

translation.en: Except for mice. They're a little creepy.

translation.en: -Supe. -What?
Sorry, Supe. We're gonna join the Santa Barbara crew.
translation.it: Scusa, capo, ma vogliamo entrare nella Squadra di Santa Barbara.

translation.en: -We just want to be in the big leagues. -[scoffs] What--
translation.it: Vogliamo lavorare coi migliori. Ma noi siamo i migliori!

translation.en: You are so in the big leagues!
Were you not in that fire? I just singed my eyebrows!
translation.it: Nell'ultimo incendio mi sono bruciacchiato le sopracciglia!

translation.en: Smell my beard, it smells like a luau.
translation.it: La mia barba puzza di barbecue.

translation.en: That was disturbing.
-Axe, you coming with us? -[Axe growls]
[Rodrigo] Ha! Ha! Go! Go! Go! Go, get out of here! Get out of here, you backstabbers.
translation.it: E va bene, andatevene! Andatevene, traditori.

translation.en: If you had a fraternity, I wouldn't even join it!
translation.it: Se aveste una confraternita, non vorrei entrarci!

translation.en: Can you even step?
Huh? We don't need you!
[shouts] We don't need you!
We need them. We need them, Chief. We just lost
three of our best jumpers and our pilot. Come on, man. What's the backup plan?
translation.it: Abbiamo perso tre paracadutisti e il pilota. Qual è il piano B?

translation.en: -We're gonna do what we always do. -[Mark] Tidy up the depot?
translation.it: Faremo come sempre. Puliremo la caserma?

translation.en: We stay vigilant. Rely on our training.

translation.en: Although, that's gonna mean that, uh…
translation.it: Ma ad ogni modo io dovrò...

translation.en: I'm gonna have to fly. [breathing heavily]
I don't know if I'm ready for that, I mean--
translation.it: Non so se sono pronto. Insomma...

translation.en: I… I… I mean, I was much more comfortable
being the backup pilot. I'm… I'm really not suited
translation.it: preferivo essere il secondo pilota. Non sono portato per il comando,

translation.en: for a leadership role, right at this moment.
translation.it: Non sono portato per il comando, - ora come ora. - Congratulazioni.

translation.en: -Congratulations. You've been called up. -[siren blaring]
translation.it: - ora come ora. - Congratulazioni. Sei il nostro pilota.

translation.en: [Rodrigo] But, Sup-- Oh, man.
Fire down by the lake.
-[alarm stops] -[pants] Relax, guys. Relax.
They don't even need us.
Local team says there's this massive storm coming here,

translation.en: and it's just gonna-- Let it burn out.
translation.it: L'incendio si spegnerà da solo. Non è il caso di essere nervosi.

translation.en: [chuckles] So there's no need to be nervous, or just relax, stay cool.
translation.it: L'incendio si spegnerà da solo. Non è il caso di essere nervosi. Stiamo calmi.

translation.en: Lieutenant, there's cabins down by that lake.
translation.it: Tenente, ci sono dei bungalow sul lago.

translation.en: I'm looking for the best of the best.
Someone who knows what a fire's gonna do before it does it.

translation.en: If you're worried about it, we could just go down there
and check it out, right?
Whoever takes over the position is going to be almost as great as me.

translation.en: We need eyes on the ground.
-Call Dr. Hicks! -Call Dr. Hicks!
Didn't you guys go on a few dates?
-[Skype call ringing] -Dates? No.
There were two or three occurrences where we sat together for chow.
translation.it: Abbiamo mangiato insieme un paio di volte.

translation.en: -Oh, so, dates. -We're-- we're professionals.
translation.it: - Oh, siete usciti insieme. - Siamo professionisti.

translation.en: I decided that, uh… -[Mark] Supe… -…our spending time together
-was taking me away from this. -Supe…
-So I chose to press pause. -In the middle of our date?
translation.it: - Ho bloccato la cosa sul nascere. - Durante l'appuntamento?

translation.en: Dr. Hicks! [clears throat]
What's the problem, Superintendent Carson?

translation.en: Why do you assume there's a problem?

translation.en: Unless you're calling three months later to apologize

translation.en: for going to the bathroom during our dinner
translation.it: di essere andato in bagno durante la nostra cena

translation.en: -and never coming back. -Oh, no, she didn't.
translation.it: senza più tornare... Non ci credo.

translation.en: -I am sorry. I will go over here. -[toads croaking]
translation.it: Scusate. Me ne vado da qui.

translation.en: Okay, there's a problem.
I need you to bring up your cameras. There's a fire down by the lake.

translation.en: There. Zoom in on that cabin. Right there.
Oh, no. Oh, I see it. I see that the--
With a storm coming in, there is no way the local depot is gonna make it.

translation.en: -Get the chopper ready. -[sighs]
-Where's my Redding Crew at? -Everywhere!
translation.it: - Dov'è la mia Squadra di Redding? - Ovunque!

translation.en: -[Axe growls] -[shudders] Everywhere. Chopper flies in five.
[Mark] Oh, look, we're off the ground. So far, so good.
All right. Deploying the Bambi, now.
[Rodrigo] All right, heads up, guys. Confirming fire structure.

translation.en: Three thousand pounds of water coming at you.
Dropping the water… now!
Okay, uh, nice try.
Can you try being a little more supportive?
I haven't flown in a while, okay?

translation.en: No, ditch the bucket. Give me a line.

translation.en: -[Jake] Good? -You're good.
Hold her steady!
You're on, you're ten feet from there.
Proceeding with room check.
Clear!
-[Bunny] I love you. -[girl 1 coughing]
-[girl 1] Bunny! -[girl 2] I will get you another one.

translation.en: -[girl 1] Bunny. -[girl 2] Zoey…
I got three civilians in the bravo side of the structure.

translation.en: -You hurt? -Are you really a fireman?

translation.en: I'm-- I'm a smokejumper, which is like a firefighter,

translation.en: -but way cooler. -What does a smokejumper do?
translation.it: - Cosa fanno i pompieri paracadutisti? - Spengono gli incendi.

translation.en: -We jump into fires to fight them. -Firemen fight fires.
translation.it: - Cosa fanno i pompieri paracadutisti? - Spengono gli incendi. Quello lo fanno i pompieri.

translation.en: Yeah, but there's over a million firefighters,
translation.it: Ma loro sono più di un milione,

translation.en: -there's only 336 smokejumpers. -A million's more than 300.
translation.it: - mentre noi siamo solo 336. - Quindi, di meno.

translation.en: In this case, less is more. Listen, stop! I don't have time.

translation.en: -Where are your parents? -They're not here.
translation.it: - Dove sono i vostri genitori? - Non ci sono.

translation.en: I-- I can't get a hold of them.
Okay, fine. I'm getting you out, one by one.

translation.it: - No. Salva prima Zoey, poi Brynn, poi me. - No, prima Zoey, poi te, poi me.

translation.en: No. No, we do what I say and we do it now!
translation.it: No! Faremo come dico io e lo faremo ora!

translation.en: Copy that. We're a go for extraction.
No. Wait. Wait! [grunts]
Stop! [grunts]
-[grunting] Wait! -The button, it's jammed.
Stop! [grunting, screaming]
This must be why there are so few smokejumpers.

translation.en: All right. Let's try this again. Come on, come on, come on.
-[Will] Oh, no! -[Jake] Whoa!
Okay, I'm gonna clip us all together, and we all go at once. Okay?

translation.en: Bunny!
Go now!
-"Now," now? -Yes, he said now!
translation.it: - Intendi "ora" ora? - Sì, ha detto ora!

translation.en: [Rodrigo] Well, he said "now" before! What if he changes his mind again?
translation.it: L'ha detto anche prima! E se cambiasse di nuovo idea?

translation.en: -[Mark] He's not gonna change his mind! -Hey, guys, focus! Now!
translation.it: - Non cambierà idea! - Ragazzi, concentratevi! Ora!

translation.en: It's the Channel Six news team!
translation.it: C'è la squadra di Channel Six!

translation.en: [male reporter] Folks, we are witnessing a live aerial rescue.
translation.it: Stiamo assistendo a un salvataggio aereo in diretta.

translation.en: Take the children to St. Stephen's for medical eval.

translation.en: -Copy that. -[Brynn] But why? We're fine.
Protocol.
Hey, Supe. Storm's on top of us. Winds are at 20 knots.
translation.it: Ehi, capo. Il temporale è sopra di noi. Il vento raggiunge i 20 nodi.

translation.en: -I… I… I need to set down, now! -[thunder rumbling]
Fine. Head back to the depot. We'll evaluate 'em there.
translation.it: D'accordo. Torniamo in caserma e li controlleremo là. USCITA DI EMERGENZA

translation.en: What the heck are three eight-year-olds doing alone
translation.it: Cosa ci fanno tre bambini di otto anni da soli in mezzo al nulla?

translation.en: -in the middle of nowhere? -Eight? I'm not eight.
translation.it: Cosa ci fanno tre bambini di otto anni da soli in mezzo al nulla? Otto? Io non ho otto anni.

translation.en: Hey! If he says you're eight, you're eight.
translation.it: Ehi! Se lui dice che hai otto anni, hai otto anni.

translation.en: Where's the pole? Can I slide down the pole?
translation.it: Dov'è il palo? Posso calarmi dal palo?

translation.en: -Depot's one floor. No pole. -Do you have a hook and ladder?
translation.it: - Questa caserma ha un solo piano. - Avete l'autobotte?

translation.en: Hook and ladder? No.
What kind of firefighter are you?
[Jake] I told you.
I'm a smokejumper, which, again, is way better.
translation.it: Sono un pompiere paracadutista, il che è molto meglio.

translation.en: Where are your parents?
[Brynn] They went up the coast for a night for their 20th anniversary.
translation.it: Stanno festeggiando il loro 20° anniversario al nord.

translation.en: And I'm extremely responsible.
I've kept these two out of trouble their entire lives.
translation.it: Ho sempre tenuto questi due fuori dai guai.

translation.en: -Hey! -Whoo!
Yeah, I can see that.
Put that down.
No shenanigans on my watch!
Yeah, no monkeyshines, tomfoolery, or hijinks.
translation.it: Giusto. Niente buffonate, birichinate o baggianate.

translation.en: You finished?
As long as there's not a hint of malarkey.
Now, if I didn't know any better,
I would say that that was sarcasm.
So why don't we just take it down a notch, sister, okay?

translation.en: Maybe a little gratitude would be helpful.
translation.it: Un po' di gratitudine non guasterebbe.

translation.en: Sorry, bud, we just don't speak oldsey-timesy.

translation.en: Oh, my gosh. Oh, but she's not stopping.
It's just-- That's just sarcasm, right? It's that-- I mean, that's not just me, right?
translation.it: È sarcastica, vero? Non lo noto solo io.

translation.en: -It's just sarcasm. -No, it's not just you. I just--
translation.it: - È sarcastica. - Non lo noti solo tu.

translation.en: -I-- I felt it now, little miss. -[Mark] Wow!
Gentlemen… I got this.
My name isn't "bud" or "man" or "dude."
It is Superintendent Jake Carson.
translation.it: Io sono il sovrintendente Jake Carson.

translation.en: But you can call me that. The whole thing.
This is Captain Mark Rogers, Lieutenant Rodrigo Torres,
translation.it: Loro sono il capitano Mark Rogers, il tenente Rodrigo Torres

translation.en: -and that is Axe. -[chuckles]
-Hi, Axe. -[growls]
Does he always carry that axe?
Yeah, 'cause he's always ready to roll.
translation.it: Sì, perché è sempre pronto all'azione.

translation.en: -[laughs] -All right, all right. What's your mom's number?
translation.it: D'accordo. Datemi il numero di vostra madre.

translation.en: You can't just cold call my mom. What do you think she's gonna do
translation.it: Non puoi chiamare mia madre così. Cosa farà quando vedrà che la chiamano i pompieri

translation.en: when she sees the caller ID from a fire station
translation.it: Cosa farà quando vedrà che la chiamano i pompieri

translation.en: and finds out her cabin burned down?
translation.it: e scoprirà che il bungalow è bruciato?

translation.en: -I'll call her. -[Jake] Fine.
and you hand it right over to me.
It's straight to voicemail.
Hey, Mom, please don't worry. We're all totally fine.
translation.it: Ciao, mamma, stai tranquilla, noi stiamo bene,

translation.en: But I'm so sorry to tell you that the cabin burned down.
translation.it: ma purtroppo il bungalow è bruciato.

translation.en: We were rescued by these smokejumpers,
translation.it: Ci hanno salvati dei pompieri paracadutisti

translation.en: which I've heard are actually way cooler than firemen.
translation.it: che pare siano molto più fichi dei pompieri normali.

translation.en: Apparently, there's only 339 of them in the entire country.
translation.it: Ce ne sono solo 339 in tutto il Paese.

translation.en: Three hundred thirty-six. And-- and this, when you do that,
that's not helpful.
So, we couldn't be in safer hands.

translation.en: -I guess you can take your time. -No! No, no. [laughing]
translation.it: Non dovete venire subito qui. No!

translation.en: Hello, ma'am. Uh… Hello, ma'am.
-Hello, ma'am? -It's still a voicemail.
This is Superintendent Jake Carson of Redding Depot, Region Five.
translation.it: Sono il sovrintendente Jake Carson. Caserma di Redding.

translation.en: I have your children.
They are physically unharmed, but I must say
they are a bit of a handful.
Please call me back ASAP to make arrangements to come pick them up.
translation.it: Mi chiami il prima possibile per dirmi quando può venirli a prendere.

translation.en: Thank you.
-Have a-- have a great rest of the day. -[keypad beeps]
That doesn't make any sense, unless-- Oh, yeah.
translation.it: Non ha molto senso, a meno che... Sì.

translation.en: Lieutenant, how bad's the storm?
Well, in the words of Mahatma Gandhi,
"It's bad. Real, real bad."
Nope. Not even one thing about that was right.
translation.it: Anche stavolta hai sbagliato in pieno.

translation.en: [chuckles] Why you got to go and blow up my spot like that?
-I wouldn't-- -[thumps]
Can we make it to the police station?
translation.it: La stazione di polizia è raggiungibile?

translation.en: Chief, it's 90 miles. The roads are all flooded.
translation.it: Capo, sono 145 km. Le strade sono allagate.

translation.en: You don't want to take the kids out in that.
What about the Safe Haven Law?
As first responders, we're legally bound for the health and welfare of the children
translation.it: Come primi soccorritori siamo responsabili della salute e del benessere dei bambini

translation.en: until they're relinquished to a legal guardian.
translation.it: finché non verranno consegnati a un tutore legale.

translation.en: Of course. I know what the Safe Haven Law is.
translation.it: Certo. Conosco la Safe Haven Law.

translation.en: Well, see? See, it's-- it's a good thing the Alpha Team quit
translation.it: È un bene che il Gruppo Alfa se ne sia andato.

translation.en: 'cause now we got all this spare room for the kids to sleep in. Huh?
translation.it: Ora abbiamo dei letti in più dove possono dormire.

translation.en: -[Rodrigo chuckles] -[chuckles] Yeah. Lucky us.
Let's do this.
Hey, guys! Do you know that the hose can reach--
Attention, everyone-- [grunts]
-Man down. I'm coming, Supe! -[Rodrigo] Whoa!
This depot is not a playground!
translation.it: Questa caserma non è un parco giochi!

translation.en: "Got your message. Thank you." [chuckles]
"There is really spotty service here. We're…
stuck due to the storm but we will set out first thing in the morning."
translation.it: Siamo bloccati per il temporale, ma partiremo domattina presto.

translation.en: "Thank you again from the bottom of our hearts."
That was a message from your mom.
translation.it: È un messaggio di vostra madre.

translation.en: Mama!
[Jake] No hugs.
I'm legally bound to take care of you, so that's what I'm gonna do.
translation.it: Sono obbligato per legge a occuparmi di voi e lo farò.

translation.en: In turn, you're gonna ditch the attitude and be obedient,
translation.it: Voi cambierete atteggiamento e sarete ubbidienti,

translation.en: so we can do our job. Fighting fires.
translation.it: così noi potremo fare il nostro lavoro. Lottare contro gli incendi.

translation.en: Why does it have to be "fighting" the fires?
Can't it just be "containing" it or "resolving" it?
